column4: Im attepting to create a script that automatically moves mp3s from the Firefox cache folder to my music directory, however there are a bunch of fiels there, none have file extension. Any ideas on how can i filter out all other files but the audio ones?
for i in *.mp3; do mv $i /new/path; done  ?
You're better off restoring from a backup. You did make a backup didn't you?
